description:
This all-natural, biodegradable insect repellent is for those who don’t care for, or can’t tolerate, DEET-based repellents. All ingredients are of plant origin.

  • Ingredients include citronella, terpene, tea tree essential oil, organic rosemary, thyme, basil, geranium, and patchouli
  • Effective against mosquitoes, biting ﬂies and deer ticks, without the using synthetic ingredients
name: Druide Lemon Eucalyptus Insect Repellent
